div.p: This page describes how to use NDC with HL7 Standards.

tr.td: National Drug Code Directory and the NHRIC Labeler Codes
The URI to identify NDC/NHRIC codes is http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc
Use YYYYMMDD for the date of publication, but see note below
The 10 digit NDC code, with "-" included. Note that different NDC codes have different positions for the "-": 1234-5678-90, 12345-6789-0, or 12345-678-90. The "-" must be correct for each NDC code
Use the PACKAGEDESCRIPTION column value from the TSV or Excel distribution file

div.p: The FDA published list of NDC codes for finished drug products is updated daily. Use the format YYYYMMDD to refer to a particular distribution. Note that while only valid NDC codes appear in the distribution file, there are other NDC codes that organizations have assigned but not yet reported to FDA. Therefore, the full set of NDCs that exists in the marketplace is unknown and cannot be versioned completely.
NDC codes have no copyright acknowledgment or license requirements.
